mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.head_img AS "headImg", a.integral AS "integral", a.phone AS "phone", a.nickname AS "nickname", a.state AS "state", a.openid AS "openid", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_user( id, name, head_img, integral, phone, nickname, state, openid, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{headImg}, #{integral}, #{phone}, #{nickname}, #{state}, #{openid}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE s_user SET name = #{name}, head_img = #{headImg}, integral = #{integral}, phone = #{phone}, nickname = #{nickname}, state = #{state}, openid = #{openid}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
